Use the RSW on the Government Guy
121111.content:
"What's that about a watch?" a man suddenly asks.

You turn and see a man wearing a trenchcoat leaning over towards you and Roger. You don't know him, but he still seems familiar. You pause for a moment, then remember where you had seen him. He was one of those guys hanging around the entrance to your dorm. Why is he so interested in your watch? Could it be that this guy ... is one of those government guys that your father was hiding from? It's a very good possibility.

So what are you going to do? You can't use the watch in front of him. He might suspect even more that the watch is the RSW. But then again, you could always use the watch on him, like erase his memory or maybe change his life so that he wasn't a government agent or something like that. What's the alternative? Just tell a lie that you're talking about a new watch you got at the store? Would the government man buy that story?
121111.title: Trenchcoat Man

choices: Modify the rules to the game. That should make it more interesting!
Do something to Roger.
1211111.content:
"It's a none of your business kind of watch - that's what" Roger says, snubbing the man.

The man retracted his head from between you two, looking down as if he were a noble.
"Quit staring" Roger said, rebuking him further. The man huffed at you both and then walked off, but you had the sense that he hadn't stopped watching you two.

"Alright, who was that?" Roger asked.
"I don't know. But the message from my dad DID say that he was trying to hide the watch from certain unruly characters" You sighed. "I didn't think they'd already be here within HOURS of me getting this thing"

"Yea, but it's a fully functioning reality manipulating watch... right?" Roger asked.
"So to speak, yea, I guess"
"So... wish for an anti theft measure? Duh..." Roger said.

You hadn't thought of that.

Quietly, you whispered into the watch. "I wish that the watch had an anti-theft measure that would prevent anyone from stealing it from me"

The watch went red this time and then displayed a message:

SUPERIOR ANTI THEFT
MEASURE ALREADY
IN PLACE


"How the hell would it have a superior anti-theft measure?" Roger asked.
"Whatever though" You replied "I guess if its superior than a reality bending wish then it should be pretty damn effective"

Nguyen meanwhile had just won her round of the match and had returned to her seat beside the other girls... And she stood out far more now as she was considerably taller than them.

"I still feel like modifying Nguyen was cheating" You said.
"Again with this? Look, if it makes you feel better, use it on someone more inconspicuous... Like some other girl in the stands" Roger said, rolling his eyes.
"Why does it have to be a girl?" You asked.
"Why not?"
"Fair point"

A further five minutes passed of awkward silence. You were scanning the stands, trying to find something to change. But for the life of you, your mind was blank to ideas.

"Your stuck aren't you" Roger smirked.
"No"
"Yes"
"No"
"You totally are"
"Shut up" You replied. "Alright, I am. So give me an idea"
1211111.title: Tell a Lie About How the Watch is Just a Watch ...

choices: Nguyen is playing later - and the winning girl has gotten stronger still!
Nguyen won't be playing any more today, so she's safe from these effects.
12111111.content:
"Why not modify the rules to the game?" Roger asked.
"How?"
Roger looked blankly at you. "You really are the crown prince of having no ideas today aren't you"

You rolled your eyes. "Alright, I have an idea. But just wait and see if you can figure out what I have done. That will make it more fun"
"I'll still be aware that it's not normal anymore?"
"Yes. But I'm changing Nguyen back, just for the sake of this"
"It better be worth it"
"It will, haha"

Firstly, you made your wish into the watch for Nguyen to return to her original form before the change and sure enough, the watch lit green and Nguyen reformed back into her petite short Vietnamese body.

Then you started your new wish to modify the rules of the game. Spelling out clearly each different rule and thinking over any possible inconsistencies. Roger had moved two seats away, just to make sure he couldn't hear anything. Not that it would be easy over the noise of the cheering.

You finished your wish and nodded to Roger so that he could return.
"Alright. It'll take effect immediately after this match. And it'll reset everything in two hours just to be safe unless we decide to keep it this way. So, prepare for a ride" You said.
"I'm looking forward to it" Roger replied.

-----

The match concluded and the announcer let everyone know that there would be a ten minute break while they prepare for the next set of matches. A few people stood up to go get refreshments but both you and Roger stayed in your seats.
"Looks the same to me" Roger said.
"Hasn't started yet"

For you, the following then minutes was a breeze. For Roger it was agonizing as he tried to see if anything had changed. But as of yet it was still ordinary earth.

The announcer cracked again, saying that the next match would be starting now. Two girls stood up from their benches and walked to their positions.
"Wait, there's neither of them have a tennis ball" Roger said.
You smiled lightly.

As if on cue, and with no cries of alarm from the audience, both girls pulled their heads off, leaving bare skin on their necks, and proceeded to use their own heads in place of the tennis balls - but at the same time so there were now two projectiles flying at once. Through means unknown, the girls bodies proceeded to play the tennis match, with fierce determination they continued to bat the heads back at one another. The heads meanwhile, appeared to undergo no ill effects while being smashed by the tennis rackets.

"This is both absolutely mental and amazing" Roger gasped.
"Only place on earth to do this. But you haven't seen the half of it yet"

Eventually, one of the girls won with a double knockout, and both heads were returned to the center line where an attendant was waiting. Both bodies walked to the center, and the winning girl announced that she would be taking control of the losing body.
"The hell is the usefulness of owning somebody's body?" Roger asked.
"Wait and see dude. Seriously, it's almost over"

Both heads were returned to their respective owners and reattached. Then the truly amazing thing happened. The winning girl merged her body with the losing girl, fully absorbing her essence into her body and morphing under the effects. It was as if she were taking the best parts of the loser and combining them into herself to make herself more powerful. She grew in height, nearly doubling her muscle strength while retaining her toned appearance. Her breasts increased in size slightly and her outfit fully stretched and contorted itself to comfortably fit this new body. She very much looked like a far more attractive version of her previous self.

"That was... amazing" Roger gasped.
"Sometimes I have good ideas"
12111111.title: Modify the rules to the game.

choices: Nguyen had won!
The stronger girl had claimed victory!
121111111.content:
"Wait, but isn't Nguyen still going to have another match soon?" Roger asked.
"Yea, I think she has one or two left" You said.
"But with that girl absorbing other girls and getting stronger, aren't you worried about her absorbing Nguyen?" He asked.

You hadn't thought of that. But you had methods of ensuring that that wouldn't be a problem.
"Want to make a bet that Nguyen can still win?" You asked Roger.
"That seems unfair considering you have the ability to change the results"
"Would I ever cheat?"
"Yes"
"Alright, fair point"

"Whats the bet" Roger asked.
"Nguyen wins, you have to play one of the tennis matches"
"And if I win?" Roger asked, raising an eyebrow. But the expression on his face showed interest.
"I'll grant you one wish - within reason - for whatever you want and even make it permanent if you like" You said proudly. There was no way Roger could back down from something so grand as that. Except as soon as he accepted, he'd have lost.
Roger rubbed his chin and sat back in his seat in the stands.
"That's a fairly good bet you have there" He said.
"Good bet indeed"
"Alright. I'll take it"
"Done" You said happily, shaking his hands.

The rules of this tennis match had been drastically altered. Rather than a pre-determined set of faceoffs against people, it was now more gladiatorial. Every time someone lost, the winner could choose to either absorb them or send them back to the bench to be done for the day. However it was considerably bias as the winner had generally absorbed the loser. In this case, the girl who had won the first time played ten more matches and won every single time. She chose to absorb six more girls. One of the girls was taller, which when combined with her now made her six feet in height and another girl had nicer tanned skin which she took with glee. The rest were just cannon fodder for her muscles. One thing that you liked in your changes was that the absorption didn't fully add the losers capabilities to the winners. It was only ever a small increase. But ten girls later it was a noticeable difference. Each time she grew slightly taller and each time her muscle strength was increased.

The seventh girl held out the longest, she was quite limber and quick on her feet. Ultimately, the match timer was called and the match went into super-overdrive-mega-knockout mode... Which basically reduces the number of rules on the court. You had gone to no expense as you lavishly remade the rules of this game. The seventh girl was taken out by a direct hit from the first girls head barrelling into her chest, knocking her clean off the court.

Finally, Nguyen's turn came and she nervously got up onto the court and took her position, pulling her head off and preparing to serve herself.
"Eh. I have already have a guess as to how this is going to turn out. I'm going to get something to eat. You want anything?" You asked Roger.
"Aye, what? You don't want to watch Nguyen lose?"
"Hey, you want food?"
"Yea, just a hotdog if that's okay"
"Done deal"

Nguyen served herself right over the net with a beautiful beginning, she quickly dived to hit the other girls head back over the court. The match was seriously intense with the stronger girls improved muscle allowing her to do some serious hits, but Nguyen had a serious speed boost, largely thanks to her toned muscles and small size. The stronger girl had also begun to get cocky thanks to her previous victories, opting to show off rather than beat Nguyen quickly.

Nguyen was beginning to sweat quickly. The match timer was called and the super-overdrive-mega-knockout mode began. The stronger girl quickly stepped up a notch, now seeing a true challenge in Nguyen's abilities. She started to hit harder and faster, trying to gain an edge over Nguyen, but it almost appeared too late. Nguyen had managed to survive through the stronger girls cocky moves and appeared to have gotten the best of her.

You were walking back up to your seat, your back to the center of the stadium where Nguyen was playing. You heard the whistle blow, indicating that someone had been defeated. The crowd went wild. Just as you sat down, you saw the look on Roger's face - a look of absolute surprise.
121111111.title: Nguyen is playing later - and the winning girl ...

choices: Roger is now forced to play in this crazy version of Tennis...
You decide to spare Roger from this crazy Tennis game...
1211111111.content:
You turned around to see whether or not your longtime girlfriend was about to become an upgrade for someone's body, and were pleasantly surprised to see that the stronger girl had lost. Nguyen had made a daring move and won by a hairline chance. The stronger girl had been knocked clean out of the lines and that was considered a loss.

The crowd was still going wild. In their minds at least, something like this never happened, a basic girl beating someone who had upgraded multiple times in a match? It was a deal breaker, the sort of thing that causes bets to turn full circle on themselves. And Nguyen had won. Well, with a tiny bit of your help but that wasn't going to be public knowledge any time soon.

"Wait" Roger started.
"Uh uh. Bet's a bet, a deals a deal. And you lost mate" You said, smirking.
"Oh damn" Roger said, putting his face in his hands.
"That means you gotta play! Relax, you'll have fun"
"I have to bat with my own head!" He yelled. Which meant nothing over the cacophony of the audience whooping and cheering.
"It's easier than you think. Walk onto the pitch, pull your head off and hit it with the racket. I actually made it so that it won't hurt at all"
"Thank goodness. When do I go?" He asked.
"When they call you"

Both players meanwhile had walked up to the center of the court. The girl who lost was dumbstruck and Nguyen was beaming. She announced that she planned to absorb the losing girls body and fuse it with her own.
"Hey, what happens to the loser - I mean, when they get absorbed?" Roger asked.
"Well, their physical matter is added to the winner and their mind ceases to exist. Which to everyone else in this stadium is a completely natural and normal thing in this game. Yea, I wouldn't say that they die, they just become part of the winner."
"That's disturbing"
"That's the game!"

Nguyen had begun to absorb the girl she had defeated. Her muscles virtually quadrupled in strength but maintained their toned almost plain appearance. She began to rise in height, now standing just over five foot six in height. Her breasts increased in size as well to match her new height and her hips enlarged slightly. She did however maintain her Vietnamese appearance but claimed the crimson hair color which now measured down to the center of her back.

Nguyen was now a bombshell beauty and clearly had become extremely popular with the fans.
"Ladies and Gentlemen! We now have a winner! Nguyen is your victor for this seasons round of tennis!" The announcer called out. The crowd was still cheering.
"Players, you may now return to the stands as we prepare for the bonus round for today" He then said.
"Bonus round? That's new" Roger queried you.
"Your special little match" You smiled.
1211111111.title: Nguyen had won!

choices: Roger goes on to win...
Roger goes on to lose...
12111111111.content:
"Nothing I can do to get out of this aye" Roger asked.
"No. You lost the best so you have to live with the consequences. I look forward to seeing the outcome" You laughed.

"Wait, whats Ashley Whittaker doing on the court?" Roger asked.
"Your challenger by the looks of it" You smirked. The bonus round allowed anyone to settle their differences with other students in the exact same format as the tennis match. However in this particular round, genders were not segregated so it was entirely possible for a female to absorb a male, and vice versa.
"Oh dammit" Roger said. He and Ashley had always been coming to blows over things in the computer labs, particularly with how certain problems should be approached. It wasn't exactly an all out war but it would be problematic if they ever had to work in the same group.

"I challenge Roger from my computer lab group!" Ashley yelled into the megaphone. "I see you up in the stands!" She pointed.

Roger sighed and stood up, walking down the steps and passing a worn out Nguyen on his way, giving her a nervous thumbs up. She smiled in response.
"Good luck!" She replied. She sat down in Rogers place and rested her head on your shoulders. Something that was a tad easier now given her increased height. You responded by putting your arm around her shoulder.
"So how did you feel about your match?"
"Honestly? Crazy nervous. I thought it was the end for me. Never beaten someone that capable before"
"Seems her ego got the better of her"
"Luck was on my side as well" Nguyen smiled. She had no idea about the watch and at this point, you had no plan to tell her.
"So whats his chances like?" You asked your extremely beautiful girlfriend.
"Hmmm... No idea. Matches with opposing genders are so hard to guess" She responded.
12111111111.title: Roger is now forced to play in this crazy versi...

choices: Roger accidentally absorbs Ashley, taking her features!
Roger chooses to let Ashley return to her seat before anything happens.
121111111111.content:
While you were distracted and mesmerized by Nguyen's new breathtaking appearance, Roger was already starting his strange game of tennis. He had no memory of this reality, being aware of the changes, so he had to be coached in the rules for a moment before the game started.

Once everything was settled, it was decided that Roger would get first serve, as the one being challenged. He winced and slowly pulled his head off his shoulders as he was instructed to do. He expected some sort of intense pain and discomfort, but opened his eyes when he realized his head felt nothing at all. He served it up in the air and simply gave it a strong whack with his racquet.

And missed the other side of the court completely. His head wiffed straight to the left, nearly flying into the stands.

Ashley was busy laughing her ass off, barely able to contain herself. "Oh god, this is funnier than I ever imagined it would be! You're going down so hard Roger! Soon you'll be finished!"

The audience didn't seem to mind the trash talking, even cheering Ashley on, despite the fact that she hadn't even done anything yet. Some in the audience were rooting for Roger, but people clearly had no hope for him now. He was given back his head, and once it reattached to his neck, he felt much more comfortable. But this time it was Ashley's turn to serve. She removed her own head, with her long brunette hair flying in the wind as she whacked it cleanly towards Roger's side.

It was a good serve, but now Roger had proper perspective and was easily able to return the serve back to Ashley. She was clearly disoriented from her vision flying all over the court, and her next hit was stopped short by the net. Once again it was Roger's serve. This time he was a little more prepared when his head came off again, and he managed to make it over the net, and the two hit it back and forth once or twice before Ashley finally scored on him. The two took turns serving their own heads for quite a while, and the game ended up being closer than anyone expected. Neither seemed terribly competent at tennis, and the points quickly racked up, but neither seemed to be able to push out a win.

You had tried paying attention to the game but Nguyen was far too alluring to ignore. You had your hands all over her, hugging her close and sneaking quick kisses now and then. You were so relieved that she was still alive, and even better looking than before nonetheless, that you stopped worrying about Roger.

Finally the whistle was blown as Roger finally edged out a victory, spiking his own head down over the net so hard that Ashley had no chance of returning it.

"And Roger wins! Congratulations on defeating your challenger!" The announcer yelled into the megaphone for the crowd to hear. "Now take your prize!"

Roger had no interest in killing Ashley and taking anything from her, but he was so hopped up on adrenaline from the game, that he wasn't thinking clearly...
121111111111.title: Roger goes on to win...

choices: He looked much more female than male, but retained some of his old self.
His body was fitter and stronger, but with a slight feminine touch.
1211111111111.content:
"Hell yeah! Take that Ashley!" Roger yelled out in a surge of adrenaline as he leaned over the net motioning towards her. "Why the hell were you challenging me anyway?"

A glint of fear appeared in Ashley's eyes as she stood there staring at Roger, unable to move. She dropped her Tennis racket and slowly began walking towards her victor. She seemed to have accepted her fate by the time she got within arm's reach of Roger, and she leaned forwards in a bow.

"Congratulations Roger..." Ashley said as she reached her hand out.

Roger shook her hand, thinking that Ashley was just trying to be a good sport about her loss, and humoring her. However he quickly felt a strange tingling in his palm, which spread throughout his entire body within seconds. He looked down and noticed Ashley's arm was halfway absorbed into his hand, and a few seconds later, her shoulder was next. He tried to step back in surprise, but his body felt unresponsive and numbed. He could only watch as the girl's entire body, clothes and all, were absorbed through his hand. In a matter of fifteen seconds, Ashley was no more, just a memory.

And the crowd went wild! Everyone was on the edge of their seats to see how Roger would change! After the absorption was complete, he looked down to see...
1211111111111.title: Roger and Ashley are one!

choices: Roger angrily grabs the watch, accidentally making everything permanent.
Roger agrees to wait out the effects and calms down.
12111111111111.content:
When Roger looked down, a lock of long brown hair fell in front of his face, causing him to start worrying. As soon as he brushed it aside, he was greeted by a pair of C cup breasts perking out from beneath his now low cut and tightly fit T-Shirt.

"Oh no..." He murmured, not noticing the slightly higher pitch his voice took on. It still sounded like his original voice, but less masculine.

The crowd cheered even harder once they saw what looked like a cute brunette girl left standing on the tennis court, staring into 'her' cleavage. Roger quickly realized he was wearing a tennis skirt and high socks and tennis shoes on a pair of shaved legs, and his whole body overall felt thinner and more athletic. In a panic, he reached down to pat the front of his pleated white skirt, and breathed a sigh of relief as he felt a familiar bulge where he expected it would be. At the slightest touch however, he felt a tingling below his male member, between his thighs, but chose to ignore it for now. He locked his legs together and suddenly realized where he was again.

The announcer placed a hand gently on his shoulder before announcing into the microphone, "Wow! Looks like our winner really took everything from his challenger! Congratulations to you sir, or ma'am, whichever you prefer!"

He held Roger's hand up in a victory pose, but Roger certainly didn't feel like a winner anymore. His face was red, and the instant the man let go of his arm, he rushed off the court, back towards your seat in the stands. You and Nguyen were both cheering him on as he ran up the stairs, attracting looks from everyone he passed by on the way. When he finally reached your seat, he was not even out of breath, but was red from embarrassment instead.

"What the hell happened Robert?!" he yelled as soon as he was close enough.

Before you could respond, Nguyen cheered on, "You kicked ass, that's what happened! I was worried at first, but just look at you! You took all of Ashley's best assets, I'm so proud!"

"Her best assets? I didn't want tits or a skirt or long hair or any of this!" Roger hissed, quieter now that only you and Nguyen could hear. "I didn't mean to absorb her, I thought she was just shaking my hand!"

You smiled, getting a real kick out of how this was going, "Well you look great, better than the original Ashley, that's for sure. This day just keeps getting better and better!"

"Shut up Robert! We need to... we need to fix this somehow." Roger mumbled as he cupped a breast briefly, with a sigh.

Your girlfriend looked at Roger, confused, "What do you mean fix? Everyone knows you can't just reverse this, that's just how it's always been. You could try to beat a male player and it might help a little, but I don't see why you'd want to? Unless you're pursuing a real tennis career, you hit the jackpot with that body."

Roger was clearly fed up with the whole situation, ignoring her advice, "Robert, how much longer on the thing?" He asked, implying the amount of time left on the watch.

You smirked, "What thing? What are you talking about? Why don't we stop worrying and just celebrate both of your victories!"

121111111111111.content:
Your teasing finally got the best of Roger, as he furiously tried to snatch the watch out of your hands. You pulled back on it, annoyed that he would try to steal it from you, but he had a tight grip on it as well.

"Hey! What gives? Let go, man!" You growled at him. This was a priceless device given to you by your dad, and you weren't about to give it up so easily, even to your friend.

"Come on, just give it up! I really need to fix this shit!" Roger growled back in his feminine voice.

Suddenly your grip slipped, and the watch slid right out of your hands, flying away from you, and Roger along with it. He flew backwards, landing on the concrete floor on his newly padded rear end. However in the process of landing, he gripped the watch a bit too tightly, and accidentally pressed down a button.

You felt a brief distortion which vanished in an instant, but you knew he'd done something. You regretted not touching the watch when he had pressed the button, and worried that something might have happened outside of your knowledge. You looked around, and everything still seemed the same. The fans in the bleachers were already mostly filed out after the event, leaving just you and your beautiful girlfriend, and your friend Roger alone. Nguyen still had the stunning new upgrades from her recent victory, looking more mature and fit than before. And Roger still had all of his new assets as well, looking very much like Ashley now. You remembered he was really angry... about something. But you couldn't seem to put your finger on it anymore.

You looked down at yourself, taking stock, and sure enough, you could still see down your own impressive cleavage, thanks to the low cut blouse Nguyen had picked out for you the other day. Everything was as it always had been... You wondered why you hadn't even tried using the watch to make a wish since you'd found it. Surely you had... hadn't you? But what was it?

As you stood there confused, you noticed Roger was beginning to panic. "Oh no, no no no... What did I press, what was that button?" He said, fumbling around the watch with his slender fingers.

"Was it the indented button on the bottom, the one that's supposed to be hard to press?" You asked, squatting down to get a look at him and the watch.

"Y-yeah... what is that?" Roger asked, suddenly sounding like a scared teenage girl.

"That's... the permanent button." You whispered, so Nguyen couldn't hear.

He thought at first Nguyen had cloned him like she had cloned herself, but when he got a good look, he realized it was not a clone of himself standing there. It was a girl, but not Nguyen, or anyone he recognized. She stood there uncomfortably looking at him, then began to look down at herself and nearly screamed.

Roger's eyes went wide, "Wait, who are you? Why are you dressed in a tennis outfit?"

Robert meanwhile began to burst into laughter as he saw what had happened. Clearly, he recognized this girl as what had previously been the fused form of Ashley and Roger, who resembled a female version of Roger, only with Ashley's good looks and outfit. Roger had never seen what his face had looked like when he was fused, so he hadn't yet figured it out.

The female Roger spun her head to look at male Roger, "What do you mean? I'm you, you idiot! Clearly, Nguyen must have made me into a girl and created a clone of my old body to taunt me."

Roger frowned, "Hey, what? You know I'm the original Roger, right? I wasn't even changed. She just made a female me appear apparently! Hey, Nguyen what gives?!"

Roger blinked, "You... you're ok with that now?"

Female Roger shrugged, "Eh, sure why not? I'm probably going to die in two hours when this wears off anyways, so I might as well make the best of it. To be honest, I feel perfectly normal in this body now."

Then Nguyen finally re-entered the room, with an excited grin on her face. "See isn't this cool?! Roger didn't want to be changed, so I made a copy of him that was ok with being changed. She's basically you, but not such a stick in the mud about being someone else. In fact, we can't go around calling you female Roger, so you should come up with a new name."

Roger's female counterpart nodded and seemed perfectly fine with this development. "Sure thing, I'll think it over for a minute!"

The real Roger was still trying to process it all, "So wait, you made... 'her' be completely open to anything? You forced her to think a certain way?"

"Kind of, I just made her feel like this is her natural body, so she doesn't complain like you would if you were her. And I might've given her a bit of a crush on you if that's what you're into." Nguyen smirked, and finally handed the watch back to Robert, who'd been suspiciously silent this whole time, despite finding the whole scene hilarious.

Meanwhile, female Roger couldn't keep her eyes off male Roger, trying to hide the fact that she was blushing whenever he made eye contact with her.

121111111111112111211122111.title: Double trouble

choices: The agents are already there...
Doesn't look like the place is surrounded...
1211111111111121112111221111.content:
"It just occured to me" Robert said. "That they'll probably go after Roger"
"Oh goody"
"Nguyen"
"We're currently flying a helicopter out of town and you want to turn back to get Roger?" She asked.
"They'll probably torture him!"
Nguyen sighed. "At least can we ditch the helicopter? This thing is loud as hell" She said.
"That would be ideal. I'll get us some alternative transport so we can get back" Robert said.

Nguyen found a large park to land the helicopter in, sending a dog running away to cower in fear of the sound. Both she and Robert got out of the chopper and Robert proceeded to talk into the watch.

"I wish for a S-36 VTOL"
"The hell is one of those?" Nguyen asked. But the watch knew what Robert wanted. Robert expertly pushed on the empty air and heard a familiar beep. The S-36 VTOL was his favorite vehicle from the video game they had been playing. It was a super silenced VTOL about the size of a large transport helicopter, but the biggest advantage was it's jet like speed and it's cloaking technology. Humanity in the game was more ingenious - and lucky - with it's research than in the real world.

Robert allowed the invisible door to open, revealing an opaque interior.
"Welcome to my beauty"
"I thought I was your beauty?" Nguyen asked, laughing. "This looks like a bit more fun!"

Robert sat in the pilots seat and turned the craft on. They sailed invisibly away from the park. Looking back downwards, Nguyen could see a few black vehicles rushing up the helicopter. It seems that they had been tracking it the whole time.
"And not a moment too soon" She said happily.

By now it was roughly midday, and the flight back to the block of housing only took a few minutes.
1211111111111121112111221111.title: The girls realise that the agents would probabl...

choices: Robert buffs up Roger's abilities...
Robert decides that it'd help the agents too much...
12111111111111211121112211111.content:
"Dammit, I can see their already there" Nguyen said, looking out the front window. Indeed, there were several cars parked around the block. They looked innocent to any given bystander, but the events of the morning had taught Robert and Nguyen otherwise.

"I'll park on the roof. It might be a bit of a fight to get downstairs" Robert said, bringing the VTOL down. Leaving the invisibility active, they left the craft and headed down the stairs.

Sure enough, there were two agents standing outside Rogers dorm. Both of the girls could here someone getting beat up inside. The agents turned to see both of the girls coming straight for them. Before they could react, Robert had slammed into both of them, sending them flying down the hallway and slumped up against the far wall, knocked out cold.
"And here you are mi'lady" Robert said, gesturing her inside. Nguyen took the response with grace and opened the door.

Rogers place had been completely trashed. Roger himself was on one of his dining chairs, an ugly bruise on his chin and right eye. The agent, facing away from them, punched him again.
"Where are they!" He yelled.
"Right behind you!" Robert yelled back. The agent looked up at them in surprise. Nguyen kicked him in the chest, sending him flying and crashing through the window and down to the ground.

"Who the hell are you?" Roger asked. "I already told him, I don't know where Robert and Nguyen are"
Roger spat some blood on the ground.
"Well, you do know now" Nguyen smiled.
"Oh my goodness... Well, this is different" Roger half smiled through his mangled face. "What's with the cloning thing you've got going on here"

"It's a long story..." Nguyen said, checking him over.
"And why do you look familiar?" Roger asked, looking directly at Robert.
"You know that new game we both got? Well, long story short, those agent people started chasing us this morning, I transformed Nguyen to help us get out and didn't realize that I just carbon copied Elissa's body onto her. Then Nguyen did the same to me"
"The watch can copy straight out of a video game?"
"It's a reality warping watch. The only thing it can't seem to do is affect those agents"

Nguyen began to tidy up Rogers face, nursing the bruises with a cold beer from the freezer.
"Yea, I was listening to two of them talking to each other. They've got electronic wristbands. Every time you use the watch, their immune to it's powers. And to top it off, apparently whenever you make a change to reality to aid you, they can make a minor change to aid them"
"What?" Nguyen asked in surprise.
"Yea... They seemed really pleased about the entire fiasco. Every time you buff yourselves up, their able to match themselves in power to you... So you two have just become physics breaking hot girls, they've probably got something equally badass out there coming for us. Thought one of them was annoyed that apparently they can't ever get one up on the changes, just match yours"

"Robert, that VTOL of yours..." Nguyen said quietly.
"Yea... they'll have something to match it. It explains why they suddenly kept getting more and more powerful every time we used the watch" Robert said.
"Yea, but they said they can only ever match you, so it's an eternal battle of wits and out-thinking. If you revert everyone back to the stone age, their stuck like that too. But if you take the battle to space... well they won't be far behind" Roger said.

"It's amazing, your finally thinking for yourself beyond the scope of attractive woman" Nguyen said, stifling a laugh.
"Yea, and I think we need to leave, now" Robert said.
"Don't suppose you could give me a few buffs?" Roger asked.
12111111111111211121112211111.title: The agents are already there...

choices: Mountains, where they shouldn't be able to find the gang...
Take the fight to them directly head on...
121111111111112111211122111111.content:
"Sure, knock yourself out" Robert said, handing the watch to Roger. Roger took the watch gleefully and studying it's intricate pattern before talking to the watch.

Nguyen and Robert watched as Roger transformed his whole body into a similar form as Robert and Nguyen. Roger now stood taller than his original body but slightly shorter than Robert. His hair became slightly messy, turned the color of auburn and lengthened down to his shoulders, with the majority of it tied back behind him. His face bore resemblance to Roberts, only it was slightly curvier and shorter. Rogers eyes now flashed a brilliant white. His clothes morphed into the same black leather that the girls had, complete with the regulation bullet proof underclothing.

"Well now, this should be fun" Roger said. His voice had changed to sounding Spanish.
"You sound Spanish but you don't look it" Nguyen said.
"What was your characters name again?" Robert asked.
"Anya"
"That's a Russian name!" Nguyen pouted.
"Magic says otherwise" Robert said, smiling. "Anyway, lets get out of here."

All three girls quickly moved out of the trashed apartment and headed upstairs. Robert made sure this time to push the permanent button so they didn't suddenly transform back half way through open air.
"So how did you get here?" Roger asked.
"VTOL" Nguyen responded.
"Robert!" Roger yelled.
"What! I didn't know they'd be able to match it!" Robert yelled back.
"Wait, so what would they get to match it?" Nguyen asked, as they ran up the stairs.
"Something pretty powerful" Robert said. "There's a few nasty counters to it"
"Like?"
"Like having counter-cloaking missiles"
"Robert!" Nguyen squealed.
"I just said I had no idea they could do that!" Robert yelled. They made it to the roof and Robert unlocked the door. Heading inside, Nguyen and Robert took the controls again and took off.

"So, where do we head now?" Nguyen asked. Roger had poked his head between theirs to join in on the conversation.
121111111111112111211122111111.title: Robert buffs up Roger's abilities...

choices: Take the fight to the agency...
Hunker down in secrecy for a while...
1211111111111121112111221111111.content:
"There's an old cabin in the mountains to the west. We should be able to hunker down there for a while until we figure out what to do" Robert replied.
"We still need to find food" Roger said.
"I've always wanted to learn hunting!" Nguyen said gleefully. "Though I suspect that it might be easy with this body"
"Well, either that or we can just use the watch" Roger shrugged.
"Sure. We get a bountiful dinner and so do they" Nguyen said flatly.
"I bet that'd make their heads scratch... 'Aye boss, whats with all this food we got?'" Roger laughed, imitating a deep voiced man.

Robert continued piloting the ship into the mountains, the city was now quite far out of sight. She found the cabin that she had walked past on treks so long ago. It had been abandoned since the cold war and it wasn't much to look at aside from four walls, a roof and a little shack for firewood. Robert set down in a small clearing near the cabin and they all disembarked.

"It just occurred to me, you should delete the ship" Nguyen said. "It'd slow them down due to that whole equalization thing"

Robert nodded and spoke into the watch. Within a few short seconds, the entire ship disappeared into the fabric of space, never to be seen again.
Roger had already headed into the cabin. "This place sucks!" She exclaimed. "Can we watchify it?"
"Watchify?" Robert asked him.
"Yea, spruce this place up! Make it not cold and damp!"

Nguyen looked briefly at Robert. Robert shrugged and then used the watch to spruce up the cabin. In place of two badly broken bunk beds was a nice ornate metal framed bunk beds, the wood was scrubbed clean and the kitchen was restocked with fresh food and water.
"Happy now?" She asked.
"So much better!" Roger said gleefully.

"So, what now?" Nguyen asked, sitting down at the round table. Roger and Robert joined her.
"I think... we should find my dad" Robert said.
"Sounds good to me" Roger said. "Got a phone number?"

Robert pulled her phone out from her pocket and began dialing. Unsurprisingly, the line was dead. "I've got reception but it won't connect." She said.
"Watchify it! Sheesh, shouldn't it be obvious by now?" Roger exclaimed.
"I'm trying to avoid using the watch so as to prevent those agents from finding us Roger" Robert retorted.
"I think it's worth the risk" Nguyen said. "Their not very hard to knock down when you kick them good"

Robert sighed and used the watch again. A small device appeared on the table with two buttons on it, a green call button and a red hangup. It had a small display attached to it with a tiny camera.
"That's our ticket!" Roger said happily. Robert picked up the device and pushed the green call button.

The device booted up instantly and the typical ringing sound played through the speakers. The display showed a "call waiting" text. It was a good two minutes before the other end finally answered.

"Hello?" The voice asked. The camera was working but the person on the other end was staying away from it. The voice was incredibly familiar to Robert.
"Dad?" Robert asked.
"Who's this? Robert?"
"Yes, it's me"
"Why do you sound like a girl"
"Why do you think"
"You turned yourself into a girl? That's... actually totally expected coming from you."

Robert pouted and Roger stifled a laugh.

"How did you contact me?" The device rang out.
"Device created by the watch" Robert replied. "I had some questions"
"I've got a few minutes"
"Alright. So what the hell is this, where the hell are you, and who the hell is chasing us?" Robert blurted out, barely containing himself.
"Sorry son... or... daughter... or I don't know. But I can't tell you where I am, in case their listening"
"And the other two questions?"
"Well... The latter is answered by the first. The first, I'll give you a brief overview. There's been a secret society within humankind right since the foundation of the first Egyptian kingdoms that has held fascination with the fabric of space and time, specifically delving into how... well, malleable, it is when you know how to fold it. They've been existing right through human history but it's always been a highly selective few who held the abilities to manipulate things around them. However, their powers have always been massively limited. The watch is like a god-device in comparison to them. I stole a few of their ancient scrolls, worked out how it all worked and built the first device"
"First device?" Robert asked.
"Yea. It was a pretty big computer and the input was entirely text based. But once I had that, I managed to use THAT machine to create the small watch you wear now. Pretty funky stuff if I do say so myself... Anyway, they found out what I had done and I was forced to destroy the large machine, bolts and all. Unfortunately, they managed to salvage a bit of it. I presume your familiar with the wristbands they have?"
"Hell yes, their super annoying" Nguyen said.
"Well, that's just it. The bands don't let me manipulate things per say, but it does let them match transformations to things equal to whatever you do, just no greater" The voice continued.

"So if I happened to renovate a log cabin..."
"Then they'd have something of an equivalent log cabin wherever they wanted. Big woohoo. And I thought I said in the note to use it SPARINGLY?"
"Yea... we didn't" Roger cooed. Roberts father sighed.
"Look, I really can't help you, I'm sorry. If you want to fight this, it's all up to you" He said. "I've... I've gotta go now. Can't let them find me"

The line went dead. Roger shook her head. Nguyen sighed and lent her head on Roberts shoulder.
"At least we got some answers" She said mournfully.
1211111111111121112111221111111.title: Mountains, where they shouldn't be able to ...

choices: They cloak the cabin and get some much needed rest.
Nguyen has a better idea.
They may have been followed...
12111111111111211121112211111112.content:
Now that the call was over, Roger shrugged and said with a slight Spanish accent, "Well your dad seems to be somewhere safe at least, if they don't know where he is. Maybe he's got the right idea? We could hide out here for a while until we figure out a plan, and learn how to use that watch better."

"Maybe..." Robert sighed, still staring at the conjured phone in her hands.

Nguyen took her head off Robert's shoulder and looked straight in her eyes. "Let's not get complacent, these people could be coming for us at any time. We have to either take the fight to them or make triple sure that they can't find us here. That means very carefully wording our wishes. They could use anything we wish for against us if we do it wrong."

"I know, I know! They probably got a communicator just like this and were able to listen in on my call with dad. In fact..." Robert said as she used the watch to remove the communicator from existence. "Just in case."

Meanwhile, Roger made herself comfortable, plopping down on a sofa and crossing her legs like her character Anya would do. "So do you think three of those agents out there spontaneously turned into super agent women, two of which look and sound basically identical?"

"Yes most likely. Well, who knows if they look like us, but they definitely have our super-human abilities." Nguyen explained in an effortless British accent. "If they did suddenly turn into girls, at the very least it might confuse them."

Roger smiled, "It doesn't look like it confused Robert all that much, or should I say 'Elissa'. She looks like she's fitting in perfectly in her new role."

"Yeah you're one to talk Anya. You normally cross your legs like that?" Robert countered in an equally British accent as Nguyen, while inspecting the watch further.

"Uh..." Roger looked down at herself, "Good point, I guess the watch made me not even think twice about this new body. I almost forgot I was Anya for a second..."

Nguyen just rolled her eyes, "Yes yes, we're all just so in character, isn't that nice? Did you figure out a way to hide us yet Robert?"

"I think I have an idea. It's risky but it'll buy us some time to think of a plan of attack. I should be able to use the watch to create a cloaking field around the cabin, which turns this whole area invisible. It'll make their cabin invisible too, but who cares, they're probably not using it."

"Why is that risky, it sounds pretty solid to me." Roger said.

"Because there's no way to be sure it really works. What if their immunity to wishes makes them immune to the cloaking field and see right through it?"

Nguyen smirked, "They weren't immune to my boot when I kicked one of them through the wall. These boots were made by the watch, not to mention my inhuman strength."

"Good point," Robert nodded, "It just might be what we need. Which is good, cause I don't know how else to protect us that also doesn't give them knowledge of how to find us."
12111111111111211121112211111112.title: Hunker down in secrecy for a while...

choices: Nguyen discovers the inventory screen...
They continue working on their gameplan.
121111111111112111211122111111121.content:
**********
End of Act 1
The story so far:
Robert acquired the Reality Shift Watch (RSW) and began using it with his friend Roger, particularly on Roberts girlfriend, Nguyen. On their morning run the next day, Robert and Nguyen were attacked by secret agents who were hell bent on getting the RSW. Robert used it on Nguyen to give her the physical appearance and capabilities of a character called Elissa that Robert created in a video game alongside Roger. She has a soft, perfectly curved face with thin lips and crystal blue eyes as well as a decently shaped figure and a British accent just to boot. In retaliation, Nguyen transformed Robert so now they are both completely identical in all but their minds.
After saving Roger from the agents, he transformed himself into his own video game character, a female Spaniard called Anya who has a near identical body to the girls but is slightly shorter, has auburn hair in a pony tail that goes to her shoulders. Her face is similar to the girls but is curvier and slightly shorter, marking a noticeable difference.

All three girls are now clad in black leather suits with the typical bullet proof undermesh. But since they're based on a video game that doesn't follow perfect physics, they have abnormally large strength and can heal from wounds in a matter of minutes or seconds. They also have inventories, which they are yet to discover.

After escaping from the agents yet again, they've hunkered down in a magically cloaked cabin in the mountains. Their latest discovery is that the agents after them have RSW immune wristbands, which has the effect of modifying their own reality to aid them in their search, but they are limited to changes equal to or less than the changes caused by the RSW
**********

Nguyen sniffed the soup she was in the process of cooking. She stirred it a few more times and then let it continue to simmer on the stove. It was almost done.
The gang had slept through the night silently, disturbed only by whatever dreams haunted them. Nguyen had woken first, now aware that the person sleeping beside her, while still Robert in mind, was actually a female identical to herself. Perhaps if unusual though, she had quickly become accustomed to this new body she was inhabiting. While she may have once been a petite Vietnamese girl, she was feeling more confident in her taller physique. Nguyen considered the concept of staying in this body forever as she watched the soup simmer. There weren't really any downsides to it, aside from the fact that nobody outside of their little all girls gang would no longer recognize her.

That being said, there were more pressing matters on her mind. They had been given the power to bend reality itself with but a simple wish - though fate had thrown them a cruel hand of cards in dealing out an equally powerful opponent. It seemed almost ironic that the fighting, regardless of where or when, would always come down to a matter of out thinking their opponent rather than by winning with brute force or using a magical wish granted by the RSW.

Robert shuddered and then sat up, now awake.
"Morning sunshine" Nguyen said cheerfully, pouring some of the soup into a bowl. The cabin was conveniently well stocked. They could thank the watch for that.
"We slept through the whole night?" Robert asked, rubbing her eyes briefly and gracefully accepting the bowl.
"All three of us... yeaup" Nguyen replied. Roger had stirred as well. She looked at the two bleary eyed from her bed.
"We both get brand new bodies and I'm still up before you" Robert smirked, looking at Roger. Roger groaned and sat up. Nguyen handed her another bowl and finished off the pot by filling her own.

"So, any ideas on what to do now?" Roger asked.
"I've been thinking about that. And if I am right, them finding us would be a matter of luck really" Robert said.
"Oh? Do tell?" Nguyen asked.
"Well, the cloaking field around this cabin is small. Pure theory here but if they have the ability to see through cloaks, then whatever tech they have probably only works in a small area - balancing and all that"
"So since we ran out of town, it'd be like looking for a needle in a haystack?" Roger asked.
"Sure. Since we had that VTOL, we could have ended up anywhere in the world due to it's mach like speeds. So in reference to your needle in a haystack, the cabin is the needle and the haystack is the planet" Robert explained.

"Which makes us perfectly safe until luck says otherwise" Nguyen said happily.
"Basically... But luck can be fickle. I think we should really consider a game plan for responding to these people"
"We could create a map that tells us where they all are at once" Roger piped up.
"That would give them a map of where WE are..." Nguyen said flatly. Roger leaned back in her chair in defeat.
"Logic says they now have three overpowered people, similar to us" Robert reminded her.

"Then, logically, we have to find a way to beat these three. That would completely unbalance their system by giving us an advantage" Roger said.
"Divide and conquer?" Nguyen asked. "If it's three of us against one of them, we could win easily. It'd just mean three fights in our favor"

Robert leaned back in her chair, considering all possibilities and potential outcomes. Ironically, this would be a fight in which they'd have to use the watch as little as possible. Any unexpected advantage on the agents side right now could destroy them utterly.

Nguyen leaned on the table with her left elbow, resting her head on her hand. She drummed on it nonchalantly with her right hand.
121111111111112111211122111111121.title: They cloak the cabin and get some much needed r...

choices: Time for some weapons practice!
Have a look at the rest of this new inventory and character screen...
1211111111111121112111221111111211.content:
Nguyen's drumming was beginning to annoy Roger, but she decided to let it go for another minute. Robert was scraping the bottom of her bowl now, still thinking.

All of a sudden, Nguyen lept back in a mixture of surprise and horror.
"Nguyen! What happened?" Robert asked, rushing to her aid, knocking her chair over in the process. Roger eyed Nguyen carefully.
"You don't see that?" Nguyen asked, calming down and pointing into midair.
"See what?" Robert asked, looking at where she was pointing. He could see nothing out of the ordinary.
"You don't see that screen?" Nguyen asked again, accepting Roberts aid in standing up. Robert and Roger both shook their heads.

To both Roger and Robert, it appeared as if Nguyen was randomly tapping on thin air.
"Whats the button for the inventory screen in that game of yours?" She asked, finally looking at the two of them.

"The 'I' key" Robert answered.
"Imagine a keyboard in front of you, and push the I key" Nguyen said helpfully. Both of the girls tried it and to their surprise, a large screen appeared in front of them, though invisible to anyone else. It looked exactly like the inventory and character screen from the game, with a brief list of their character statistics and their current inventory. As best as Robert could make out from the equip tab, she only had clothing on her. However, her inventory listed two 'Tec-2' pistols... Her favourite weapons from the game which despite lower than average damage, had unlimited ammunition thanks to being laser based.

She dragged the items to her equipment tab and watched as two pistols formed out of thin air, holstered to her belt.
"Well, that's new" Robert said gleefully.
"It'd be the advantage we probably need" Roger said, inspecting her own assault rifle.
"Never could turn down a gun like that could you?" Robert asked, looking briefly at the clearly powerful rifle in Rogers hands.

Nguyen's inventory was identical to Roberts, though rather than pulling out the dual pistols, she attempted to equip the marksman's sniper rifle. It appeared holstered over her back.
"I've never used a gun before" Nguyen said, looking blankly at Robert.
1211111111111121112111221111111211.title: Nguyen discovers the inventory screen...

choices: They make some drinks and enjoy the rest of the evening.
Nguyen convinces them a party is a bad idea.
Robert and Roger just get drunk without her.
12111111111111211121112211111112111.content:
*pewpewpewpewpew* In a matter of seconds, the paper target was a charred mess full of holes. Robert holstered her two laser pistols looking like a complete badass. She turned around and smiled at Nguyen, who was quite impressed.

"Wow, I had no idea you were such a good shot!" She said.

Robert shrugged, "I'm not really, but Elissa is, so that means we are too. You should give that sniper rifle a try."

Nguyen looked back at the large rifle on her back, unsure. However before she could act, Roger butt in with her assault rifle. "Oh, can I try first? I really wanna get a feel for this thing!"

"I... I guess so. Here.." Robert used the watch to spawn in a bunch of temporary magazines for Roger's gun.

Roger loaded one and pulled the chamber back, enjoying the heft of the powerful weapon in her hands. She seemed surprised that she had the strength to pull it back so easily but then remembered that Anya was very strong and used to handling weapons like this. "Hey, move the targets a bit further back, this time, I want to see what this thing can do!" She said with a Spanish lilt to her voice.

The targets on the range all began to slide farther away, as they were on rails. Robert had created this room using the watch, which existed inside of their cabin. Despite the cabin being quite small, the room itself seemed to defy all physics as it was hundreds of meters long, but didn't show up on the outside of the building. Similar to their magical inventory space, Robert realized she could create a room that was much bigger on the inside than the out. All it took was a simple wish and the watch took care of the rest.

"Perfect..." Roger said as she looked down the sights and took aim at the more distant targets now.

With several controlled bursts, Roger was able to hit the majority of the targets first try, even up to two hundred meters. When the targets were moved up closer, she went full auto and mowed down a dozen targets in a short amount of time. "Oh yeah... that's what I'm talking about. This is just how I designed Anya to be."

"Impressive, I think I want to try now though." Nguyen said, inspecting the large sniper rifle while 'Anya' was busy murdering targets.

They moved the targets out to a hundred meters for her first attempt, but to everyone's great surprise, she barely even had to look down the scope to land a bullseye. "Holy shit, did I just do that? I wasn't even thinking about pulling the trigger yet..."

"You have Elissa's instincts. She's a pilot AND a marksman, remember?" Robert bragged, clearly proud of her character being so skilled.

"Well ok... can this thing shoot farther?"

"Of course, it's the longest range gun in the game, why do you think I made this range so damn big?"

The targets flew out to two hundred meters this time, and Nguyen still had no trouble. Three hundred, still easy. Five hundred, and she finally had to take a moment to control her breath and steady the weapon on her knee while crouched. The powerful rifle would have knocked her over from the recoil, if Elissa's instincts hadn't had her positioned properly.

"Wow... this feels amazing to be able to hit something so far... is there anything else I can do?" Nguyen marvelled at her sudden newfound skill.

"Well..." Finally Robert decided it was time to modify the range, and extended it out to over a kilometer in length. They needed binoculars just to see the targets, something that Robert was able to provide.

Nguyen got down prone on her stomach, and let her instincts take over adjusting the scope for the distance. She loaded a new magazine and pulled a round up into the chamber. After patiently timing her breaths, she finally let the bullet loose. It echoed down the incredibly long room, and they were all glad to be wearing ear protection.

Robert and Roger were both trying to see if she hit with their binoculars, and sure enough, a shot was landed right in the target's chest. "Oh my god you did it. Can you do it again?"

Nguyen obliged, but this time the bullet flew just shy of the head. She cursed herself for missing, but gave it a third attempt. This one landed square between the target's eyes. Robert and Roger cheered, completely floored by what she'd done.

"Good lord that was incredible!" Robert cheered, running up and giving her doppelganger a hug when she stood up.

Nguyen blushed as their identical breasts squished together, "Was it really that good? I mean I missed that one time..."

"Are you kidding? I put the target a little outside the range that gun's supposed to hit at. In the game that shot would have been impossible! But real life physics meant that you still had a chance, and you made two out of three which is crazy!"

Roger put her arms around her friend's shoulders, "You know this calls for a celebration right? How well can that watch make alcohol?"

"Dunno, only one way to find out. First let's clean up this range so the people following us don't get any funny ideas." Robert said as the gun range vanished before their eyes, leaving behind only a plain cabin wall where it once was.

Nguyen placed the rifle back in her magical inventory, and looked at the other two girls skeptically. "Are you sure we need to be carelessly using the watch on getting drunk? We need to be prepared, we can't just be wasting it on silly things like a party..."

"Relax, love," Robert said in Elissa's English accent, "What are they going to do, get drunk off the beer we make for them? It'll be fine, and we can't stay paranoid forever!"
12111111111111211121112211111112111.title: Time for some weapons practice!

choices: The agents have become part of the American Warlords!
The agents have become part of the Dominion!
121111111111112111211122111111121112.content:
"I'm still not convinced it's a good idea." Nguyen pouted. "What if they get the drop on us because they've been watching - and then they know we're drunk off our face?"
Roger rolled his eyes. "Fine, you can stay sober while I have a good time" Robert, however, abstained from giving her the watch.

"Yea... perhaps your right" Robert said dejectedly.
"And besides, we're all skilled up now! Maybe we should take the fight back to them?" Nguyen asked eagerly.

Robert looked at Roger, questioning her stance. Roger just shrugged. "I'm good for a fight". Rogers accent was becoming more pronounced by the hour.

"Alright, but if we are going to do this, we need a plan. A good plan - something preferably infallible." Robert said, sitting down in a chair.
"Doesn't help that we don't know where they are" Roger said. "Or what they look like now. I mean, since we changed they've probably changed attire as well"
Nguyen pondered the statement. "That's rather a good point. But maybe we can use that to our advantage?"
"How so?" Robert asked.
"Well, if they've changed attire to match us three, then logically it'd be something from that game of yours" Nguyen said.
"The dominion then?" Roger asked Robert.
"Whats the dominion?" Nguyen asked.

"Ehhh.... Long storyline made short, the politicians of the world met in a singular building to try and ratify some sort of world peace. Terrorists blew the place up which effectively destroyed the worlds leadership. The countries of Europe fell into pitiful squabbling until the UK and Spain sorted them out, forming the European Alliance forces. Most of Russia, Asia and the middle east reformed into the Dominion... though from what I understand it's really the Russians and the Chinese telling everyone else what do to"
"You haven't mentioned America yet" Nyugen asked.

info.brief_description: Robert gets a special watch that lets him change reality for two hours at a time.
info.description:
Your name is Robert Dansbury. You're 18 and you've just started college. A few weeks after your parents dropped you off at school, you find a mysterious package in your mailbox. It's from your father and includes a note telling you that he's disappeared, and to keep the Reality Shift Watch (RSW) a secret. Apparently a government organization is pursuing him, and he leaves the watch in your care to keep it safe. In the note is also an explanation of its powers:

1. Allows you to change the way everyone sees reality on a global or local scale. For example: you decide to give yourself breasts. If you change reality on a global scale, all men in the world grow breasts and that's the way it has always been. If you change reality on a local scale, only you grow breasts but no one thinks it is abnormal.

2. The watch can create whole new stories and events in reality to account for the changes you make. For example: you decide to make a woman hyper-intelligent on a global scale. This makes all women in the world hyper-intelligent, thus forcing the watch to make them the dominant gender, ie all Presidents are women.

3. The watch's powers last only for two hours, unless you hit the Permanent button. If you do, all of the changes you have made are then the default settings of reality. If you make new changes, they'll only last for two hours.

4. If you tell someone about the watch's power, they become immune to its effects and will know how reality shifts.

Characters:

1. Robert Dansbury: 5'9" average guy, with slightly muscular build and good looks. Brown hair, green eyes, he's in college with a major in biochemistry. He loves adventure, and has always harbored a secret love for gender bending fantasies.

2. Mark Dansbury: Robert's father, 6'3", very muscular man, 51 years old and with a full head of brown hair. Blue eyes and devilish good looks, Mark is a research scientists who develops the RSW. He disappears at the beginning of the story.

3. Nguyen Minh-Ho: Robert's girlfriend, 5'0", petite Vietnamese girl with a spunky attitude. 18 years old, same as Robert, she is also attending the same university as he is. She is one of the first to be affected by the RSW.

4. Roger Platts: Robert's best friend, 6'0", red hair and freckles with a gangly build. He lives in the same building as Robert does and is always helping him out in his adventures.

Please remember to keep it:

-PG-13. Sex is allowed, but nothing explicit and don't go into the nitty gritty details.
-Please advance the story! It's okay to have it come to an end, but make sure there are plenty of transformations in the meantime.
-Don't let Robert die. Others can die, but he should stay alive.
-Have fun! Go wild with the swaps and reality changes, think of anything you want!
